content.question: Which of the following was an effect in the late 1700s of the passage of the legislation described in the second paragraph of the excerpt?

choices.label: The banning of the international slave trade
The expansion of voting rights to all White men
The establishment of a process for admitting new states
The forced relocation of Native Americans to reservations

content.answer: The establishment of a process for admitting new states

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
